body_html: Well yes, that would work, but then we are allocating + deallocating (and of course allocating a second representation after that). I should be able to just sub-class to get what I want though, so NBD.

body: Well yes, that would work, but then we are allocating + deallocating (and of course allocating a second representation after that).  I should be able to just sub-class to get what I want though, so NBD.
